name: Bishoujo Hunter ZX
overview: In the 1990-ies, increased tension between powerful countries of the world and economic crisis have eventually lead to open hostility. By 2018, the world was nearly destroyed in a devastated war. A handful of scientists working for peace have devised a plan - called "Project ZX" - to prevent this disaster from happening. All they need are a dozen of young, pretty girls, who would be trained with the newest scientific equipment. The hero of the game is a lazy teenager, fan of computers and - surprise! - pretty girls, and he is the one who is entrusted by an old scientist to find and recruit these special girls, aided by a robotic bird named Chico. Bishoujo Hunter ZX is a text-heavy Japanese-style adventure. The game world is composed of still screens, which offer interaction in form of menu-based verb commands. Typically for the genre, events are often triggered by going through most or all the commands at any given screen.
